test_description: Verify recursive sync worker handles pagination and self-triggering via QStash without hitting serverless timeouts
business_risk: Critical - Incomplete data import leads to incorrect analytics and user churn
preconditions: Mock Salla API configured with 50 pages of orders; QStash emulator running
test_steps: 1. Trigger sync job for Merchant A; 2. Worker processes Page 1; 3. Assert Page 1 data in DB; 4. Verify QStash event published for Page 2; 5. Simulate function termination; 6. Verify consumer picks up Page 2 event
expected_result: All 50 pages processed sequentially across multiple function invocations; Status updates to COMPLETED
test_data_needs: Large mock dataset of Salla Orders
success_criteria: Zero data loss; recursive chain completes; state persisted correctly
cleanup_requirements: Flush QStash queue; Truncate merchant data
security_considerations: Ensure Salla tokens are decrypted securely during execution

test_description: Validate SQL Parser Middleware blocks cross-tenant data access attempts in AI-generated queries
business_risk: Critical - Data leakage between merchants destroys trust and violates privacy laws
preconditions: AI Service running; Mock OpenAI response injection
test_steps: 1. Inject malicious LLM response (SQL without WHERE merchant_id); 2. Pass to SQL Parser Middleware; 3. Assert middleware throws SecurityException; 4. Inject valid SQL; 5. Assert middleware appends/verifies merchant_id
expected_result: Middleware rejects any SQL missing strict merchant_id scoping; automatically injects scope if missing but valid
